intro: Feel the tension of the big match breaking through the screen.
description:
In Ping Pong Up, your reflexes and precision will be the key to success.

Play face to face with up to 4 friends or against the AI.
What is your longest ping pong streak? Prove it with “Challenge” mode and reach Number 1 on the online ranking. But careful with the bonuses that will appear! Some will help you improve your score but others could end your game.

Features:
- Easy to play, hard to master.
- Twin-stick controller.
- 2 or 4 player Vs-mode.
- Challenge mode with bonuses.
- Game mode against the AI.
- Online ranking.
